title: Bug Splat after 8.1
body:
So i am a little late to windows 8.1, i was using windows 8 before.
The game was running fine nothing was wrong, i ran the graphics on high and would get easily 100+ fps.
However i recently upgraded to windows 8.1 and after i did, the first time i opened league a bug splat error occured on the launcher (the launcher did not close and i could till click launch like normal)
When i log in everything seems normal but after champ select when i load to go into the game, before the champion slot borders appear, my game crashes to the screen where i can click the orange reconnect button , it comes up with a bug splat error.
After i click dont send and click reconnect the same thing happens.

**_EDIT_**
So i realised that my issue is not only with League Of Legends, I play another game called Paladins by Hi-Rez Studios and with that when i click play (Same as clicking launch on league) a black screen appears, exits full screen mode and comes up with a text box saying that Paladins is not responding, eventually it forces me to close the program. This happens everytime i open Paladins.
With this information I think the issue is with my computer not League and Paladins.
If you need any other information let me know.

**Hope you can help!**
Thanks in advance :D
